sentences.en: The government started to denationalize financial institutions.
sentences.cn: 政府开始将金融机构私有化。

words.tran_cn: 剥夺国籍；剥夺公民权利；非国有化
剥夺……的国民权利；使……恢复为私营；开除……的国籍

trans.tran_cn: 使（工业等）非国有化；使变成私营；开除…的国籍
trans.tran_en: to sell a business or industry that is owned by the state, so that it is then owned privately
to sell a business or industry that is owned by the state, so that it is then owned privately
